reportincident-dialog-first-step-cancel-: I don't want to file a report
reportincident-dialog-additional-details: Add context that could be helpful for a reviewer
reportincident-dialog-links-evidence-pla: Provide a link to the harassment
reportincident-dialog-harassment-intro-t: Inappropriate behavior is not tolerated on {{SITENAME}}.
reportincident-dialog-harassment-lead-in: Per the [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Universal_Code_of_Conduct|Universal Code of Conduct]], unacceptable behavior includes but is not limited to:
reportincident-dialog-engage-text: If {{GENDER:|you}} feel safe doing so, {{GENDER:|you}} can try talking to the person bothering {{GENDER:|you}}. Inform them of the Universal Code of Conduct on {{SITENAME}} and that they must be respectful. This can sometimes help stop the harassment.
reportincident-dialog-admin-review: {{GENDER:|Your}} report will be sent to [$1 an admin] to review.
reportincident-dialog-harassment-empty: {{GENDER:|You}} must select at least one behavior.
reportincident-dialog-violator-empty: {{GENDER:|You}} must specify a username to report.
reportincident-dialog-links-empty: {{GENDER:|You}} must provide link(s) to evidence of the incident.
reportincident-dialog-something-else-emp: Please provide a short description of the behavior.
reportincident-unable-to-send: Unable to email send incident report.
reportincident-email-body:
Reporting user: $1
Reported user: $2
Link to page: $3
Reported link: $4
Behaviors: $5
Details: $6

Email $1: $7
